    function bubbleSort(arr) {
  var len = arr.length; // 
  for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) { // 
        console.log(arr[i], arr[i+1])
  for (var j = 0; j < len - 1 - i; j++) {

  if (arr[j] > arr[j+1]) { //
  var temp = arr[j+1]; //
  arr[j+1] = arr[j];
  arr[j] = temp;
  }
  }
  }
  return arr;
  }
  var arr=[3,44,38,5,47,15,36,26,27,2,46,4,19,50,48];
  console.log(bubbleSort(arr));//[2, 3, 4, 5, 15, 19, 26, 27, 36, 38, 44, 46, 47, 48, 50] 


    function selectionSort(arr) {
  var len = arr.length;
  var minIndex, temp;
  console.time('');
  for (var i = 0; i < len - 1; i++) {
  minIndex = i;
  for (var j = i + 1; j < len; j++) {
  if (arr[j] < arr[minIndex]) { //
  minIndex = j; //
  }
  }
  temp = arr[i];
  arr[i] = arr[minIndex];
  arr[minIndex] = temp;
  }
  console.timeEnd('');
  return arr;
  }
  var arr=[3,44,38,5,47,15,36,26,27,2,46,4,19,50,48];
  console.log(selectionSort(arr));//[2, 3, 4, 5, 15, 19, 26, 27, 36, 38, 44, 46, 47, 48, 50]


    function binaryInsertionSort(array) {
  console.time('');
  for (var i = 1; i < array.length; i++) {
  var key = array[i], left = 0, right = i - 1;
          // key = 3 ,left = 0, right = 0
          // key = 44 ,left = 0, right = 1
  while (left <= right) { // 0 <= -1   // 0 <= 1
  var middle = parseInt((left + right) / 2); // 0 // 0
  if (key < array[middle]) { // 3 < arr[0] = 44 44 < 44
  right = middle - 1; // right = -1
  } else {
  left = middle + 1;  // left = 1
  }
  }
  for (var j = i - 1; j >= left; j--) { //  
  array[j + 1] = array[j]; // arr[1] = arr[0]  arr [2] = 
  }
  array[left] = key; // arr[0] = 44
  }
  console.timeEnd('');
  return array;
  }
  var arr=[44,3,38,5,47,15,36,26,27,2,46,4,19,50,48];
  console.log(binaryInsertionSort(arr));//[2, 3, 4, 5, 15, 19, 26, 27, 36, 38, 44, 46, 47, 48, 50];

class CounterButton extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {count: 1};
    }
    shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {
        if (this.props.color !== nextProps.color) {
            return true;
        }
        if (this.state.count !== nextState.count) {
            return true;
        }

function checkedType(target) {
  return Object.prototype.toString.call(target).slice(8, -1)
}
//---/
function clone(target) {
  //
  //result 
  let result,
    targetType = checkedType(target)
  if (targetType === 'Object') {
    result = {}
  } else if (targetType === 'Array') {
    result = []
  } else {
    return target
  }
  //
  for (let i in target) {
    //
    let value = target[i]
    ///
    if (checkedType(value) === 'Object' || checkedType(value) === 'Array') {
      ////
      //value
      result[i] = clone(value)
    } else {
      //value
      result[i] = value
    }
  }
  return result
}

function checkedType(target) {

}
//---/
function clone(target) {
  //
  //result 
  let result,
    targetType = checkedType(target)
  if (targetType === 'Object') {
    result = {}
  } else if (targetType === 'Array') {
    result = []
  } else {
    return target
  }
  //
  for (let i in target) {

    if (checkedType(value) === 'Object' || checkedType(value) === 'Array') {

      result[i] = clone(value)
    } else {
      //value
      result[i] = value
    }
  }
  return result
}

import axios from 'axios' // axios
import vm from '@/main'    // vue


// axios
var instance = axios.create({
  // postformdata// axiosheaderContent-Type'application/json;charset=UTF-8'
    headers: {  
      'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded',
      'token': 'asdasdasdasdasdasd' // 
    },
    withCredentials: true // cookie
})

// 
instance.interceptors.response.use(function (response) {
  // 
  return response.data
}, function (error) {
  // 
  console.log(error.response.status)
  if (error.response.status !== 401) {
    vm.$error(error.response.data.message)
  }
  // 
  return Promise.reject(error)
})

export const get = (url, data) => instance.get(url, {
  params: data
}) // get

export const post = (url, data) => instance.post(url, data) //post
export const put = (url, data) => instance.put(url, data) //put

api/index.js

Post.title: JS deboucethrottle
Post.content:
JS deboucethrottle

DOM onmousemove, onscrollonresize onkeyup

debounce throttling

(debouce)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Test</title>
</head>
<body>
    <input type="text" name="input" onkeyup="debouce(inputHandler);">
    <script type="text/javascript">
         let i = 0;
        function inputHandler () {
            console.log(i++); 
        }
        let timer;
        function debouce (fn) {
            clearTimeout(timer); 
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
                fn();
            }, 500)
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

throttle

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Test</title>
</head>
<body>
    <input type="text" name="input" onkeyup="debouce(inputHandler);">
    <script type="text/javascript">
         let i = 0;
        function inputHandler () {
            console.log(i++); 
        }
        let timer;
        function throttle (fn) {
            if (timer) {
                return;
            }
            timer = setTimeout(() => {
                fn();
            }, 200);
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

Post.content:
API

javascript API

key

vue

/index.html

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://webapi.amap.com/maps?v=1.4.12&key=key"></script>

/build/webpack.base.conf.js

module.exports = {
    externals: {
        AMap: 'AMap'
      },
}

/map.js

import AMap from 'AMap'
/* eslint-disable */
let maps
const map = { // 
  geolocation () {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      AMap.plugin('AMap.Geolocation', () => {
        var geolocation = new AMap.Geolocation({
          // true
          enableHighAccuracy: true,
          // 
          timeout: 10000
        })
        geolocation.getCurrentPosition() // 
        AMap.event.addListener(geolocation, 'complete', (data) => {
          resolve(data)
        }) // 
        AMap.event.addListener(geolocation, 'error', (data) => {
          reject(data)
        }) // 
      })
    })
  },
  citySearch () { // 
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      AMap.plugin('AMap.CitySearch', () => {
        const citySearch = new AMap.CitySearch()
        citySearch.getLocalCity(function (status, result) {
          if (status === 'complete' && result.info === 'OK') {
            // result
            resolve(result)
          }
        })
      })
    })
  },
  search (key, city) { // 
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      AMap.plugin(['AMap.PlaceSearch'], () => {
        var placeSearch = new AMap.PlaceSearch({
          city: city
        })
        placeSearch.search(key, (status, result) => {
          if (result.poiList) {
            resolve(result.poiList.pois)
          }
        })
      })
    })
  },
  renderMap (el) { // 
    console.log(el)
    maps = new AMap.Map(el, {
      resizeEnable: true, // 
      zoom: 17,
      center: [116.408075, 39.950187],
      features: ['bg', 'road', 'building', 'point']
    })
    // AMap.plugin(['AMap.ToolBar', 'AMap.Scale'], function () {
    //   maps.addControl(new AMap.ToolBar())
    //   maps.addControl(new AMap.Scale())
    // })
  }
}

export default map

Post.title: fetch
Post.content:
fetch

fetch

  • fetchgetpost
  • fetchcookie
  • fetch
  • fetchresponsejson
  • token
const objParseQuery = (data) => {
  let paramsArray = [];
    let parameter = ''
    //
    Object.keys(data).forEach(key => {
            if (data[key]) {
                    paramsArray.push(key + '=' + data[key])
            }
    })
    if (parameter.search(/\?/) === -1) {
            parameter += '?' + paramsArray.join('&')
    } else {
            parameter += '&' + paramsArray.join('&')
  }
  return parameter
}
let fetchs = {
  /**
    *  fetch  GET
    * @param url
    * @param params {}
    * @param headers
    * @returns {Promise}
    */
   get: (url, params) => {

     var fetchConfig = {
         method: 'get',
         headers: {
           authorization: window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') ? window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') : null,
           'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'
         },
         credentials: "include",
         mode: 'cors',
     }
     if(params){
      url += objParseQuery(params.data);
     }
     console.log(url)
     return fetch(url, fetchConfig).then(response => {
       return response.json().then((res) => {
         console.log(res)
         if (response.ok && res.code === 1) {
           return Promise.resolve(res)
         } else {
           return Promise.reject(res)
         }
       })
     })
     },
     post: (url, options) => {
       return fetch(url, {
         method: 'post',
         headers: {
           authorization: window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') ? window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') : null,
           'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'
         },
         credentials: "include",
         mode: 'cors',
         body: JSON.stringify(options)
       }).then(response => {
         return response.json().then((res) => {
           if (response.ok && res.code === 1) {
             console.log(window.sessionStorage.getItem('token'))
             return Promise.resolve(res)
           } else {
             return Promise.reject(res)
           }
         })
       })
     },
     put: (url, options) => {
      return fetch(url, {
        method: 'post',
        headers: {
          authorization: window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') ? window.sessionStorage.getItem('token') : null,
          'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'
        },
        credentials: "include",
        mode: 'cors',
        body: JSON.stringify(options)
      }).then(response => {
        return response.json().then((res) => {
          if (response.ok && res.code === 1) {
            console.log(window.sessionStorage.getItem('token'))
            return Promise.resolve(res)
          } else {
            return Promise.reject(res)
          }
        })
      })
    }
}

export default fetchs

}
function Child() {
  Parent.call(this);
  this.type = 'child';

function Parent() {
  this.name = 'parent';
}
function Child() {
  this.type = 'child';
}
Child.prototype = new Parent();

+

function Parent() {
  this.name = 'parent5';
  this.play = [1, 2, 3];
}

function Child() {
  Parent.call(this);
  this.type = 'child5';
}
// `Child``prototype``Parent``prototype`
Child.prototype = Object.create(Parent.prototype); 
// Childconstructor
Child.prototype.constructor = Child;

	yum install gcc gcc-c++

 

##

**2017814**

> 1.
> /usr/local/src

	cd /usr/local/src

 

> 2.PCRE
> ftp://ftp.csx.cam.ac.uk/pub/software/programming/pcre/  PCRE  PCRE 

 

	cd /usr/local/src

	wget ftp://ftp.csx.cam.ac.uk/pub/software/programming/pcre/pcre-8.41.tar.gz

	tar -zxvf pcre-8.41.tar.gz

	cd pcre-8.41

	./configure

	make

	make install

 

 
> 
> 3.zlib
> http://zlib.net/zlib-1.2.11.tar.gz  zlib  zlib

 


	cd /usr/local/src

	wget   http://zlib.net/zlib-1.2.11.tar.gz

	tar -zxvf zlib-1.2.11.tar.gz

	cd zlib-1.2.11

	./configure

	make

	make install

 

> 4.sslvpsssl)

 

	cd /usr/local/src

	wget https://www.openssl.org/source/openssl-1.0.2l.tar.gz

	tar -zxvf openssl-1.0.2l.tar.gz

 

> 5.nginx

**Nginx  Nginx  /usr/local/nginx **

 

	cd /usr/local/src

	wget http://nginx.org/download/nginx-1.13.4.tar.gz
	
	tar -zxvf nginx-1.13.4.tar.gz

	cd nginx-1.13.4

 

	./configure --sbin-path=/usr/local/nginx/nginx

	--conf-path=/usr/local/nginx/nginx.conf

	--pid-path=/usr/local/nginx/nginx.pid

	--with-http_ssl_module

	--with-pcre=/usr/local/src/pcre-8.41

	--with-zlib=/usr/local/src/zlib-1.2.11

	--with-openssl=/usr/local/src/openssl-1.0.2l

 

	make

	make install

Post.title: vuemixins
Post.content:
vuemixins

(mixins) Vue 

// 
var myMixin = {
  created: function () {
    this.hello()
  },
  methods: {
    hello: function () {
      console.log('hello from mixin!')
    }
  }
}

// 
var Component = Vue.extend({
  mixins: [myMixin]
})

var component = new Component() // => "hello from mixin!"


var mixin = {
  data: function () {
    return {
      message: 'hello',
      foo: 'abc'
    }
  }
}

new Vue({
  mixins: [mixin],
  data: function () {
    return {
      message: 'goodbye',
      bar: 'def'
    }
  },
  created: function () {
    console.log(this.$data)
    // => { message: "goodbye", foo: "abc", bar: "def" }
  }
})


var mixin = {
  created: function () {
    console.log('')
  }
}

new Vue({
  mixins: [mixin],
  created: function () {
    console.log('')
  }
})

// => ""
// => ""

methods, components directives

var mixin = {
  methods: {
    foo: function () {
      console.log('foo')
    },
    conflicting: function () {
      console.log('from mixin')
    }
  }
}

var vm = new Vue({
  mixins: [mixin],
  methods: {
    bar: function () {
      console.log('bar')
    },
    conflicting: function () {
      console.log('from self')
    }
  }
})

vm.foo() // => "foo"
vm.bar() // => "bar"
vm.conflicting() // => "from self"

Vue.extend()

Vue 

//  'myOption' 
Vue.mixin({
  created: function () {
    var myOption = this.$options.myOption
    if (myOption) {
      console.log(myOption)
    }

methods, components directives

//gzip

let server=http.createServer(function(req,res){
    console.log(req)
    var zp=req.headers[['accept-encoding']]
    console.log(zp)
    if(zp.indexOf('gzip')!=-1){//gzip

        var gzip = zlib.createGzip();
        res.writeHead(200, {// Content-Encoding gzip 
            'Content-Encoding': 'gzip'
        });
        let ws=fs.createWriteStream("./cop.js.gz")
        fs.createReadStream("./cop.js").pipe(gzip).pipe(ws);
    }else{

        fs.createReadStream("./cop.js").pipe(res);
    }
    res.end()

}).listen(3000)

16.3context api,

const {Provider, Consumer} = React.createContext({
    color: 'white'
});


class Item extends Component {
    static contextTypes = {
        color: React.PropTypes.string,
    };

    render() {
        const {value} = this.props;
        return (
            <Consumer>
                {context => (
                    <li style={{background: context.color}}>
                        <span>{value}</span>
                    </li>
                )}
            </Consumer>
        );
    }
}


class List extends Component {

    render() {
        const {list} = [{id: '1', text: 1}, {id: '1', text: 2}, {id: '1', text: 3}]
        return (
            <Provider value={{color: 'green'}}>
                <div>
                    <ul>
                        {list.map((entry, index) => (
                            <Item key={entry.id} value={entry.text}/>
                        ))}
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </Provider>
        );
    }
}

import React,{ Component } from "react";
import emitter from "./ev"

export default class Foo extends Component{
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            msg:null,
        };
    }
    componentDidMount(){
        // 
        // 
        this.eventEmitter = emitter.addListener("callMe",(msg)=>{
            this.setState({
                msg
            })
        });
    }
    // 
    componentWillUnmount(){
        emitter.removeListener(this.eventEmitter);
    }
    render(){
        return(
            <div>
                { this.state.msg }
                 1 
            </div>
        );
    }
}

Boo.js

import React,{ Component } from "react";
import emitter from "./ev"

export default class Boo extends Component{
    render(){
        const cb = (msg) => {
            return () => {
                // 
                emitter.emit("callMe","Hello")
            }
        }
        return(
            <div>
                 2 
                <button onClick = { cb("blue") }></button>
            </div>
        );
    }
}

var app5 = new Vue({
    el: '#app5',
    data: {
        shoppingList: [
            "Milk", "Donuts", "Cookies", "Chocolate", "Peanut Butter", "Pepto Bismol", "Pepto Bismol (Chocolate flavor)", "Pepto Bismol (Cookie flavor)"
        ],
        key: ""
    },
    computed: {
        filterShoppingList: function () {
            // `this` points to the vm instance
            var key = this.key;
            var shoppingList = this.shoppingList;
            //filterfilterfilteritemfilteritem
            return shoppingList.filter(function (item) {
                return item.toLowerCase().indexOf(key.toLowerCase()) != -1
            });;
        }
    }
})

template

    <ul>

  let memoizedState = [] // memoizedState
  let curson = 0 // memoizedState
  function useState(ininvalState) {
    memoizedState[curson] = memoizedState[curson] || ininvalState
    function setState(newState) {
      memoizedState[curson] = newState
      render()
    }
    return [memoizedState[curson++], setState] // hookscurson,

  let memoizedState = []; // hooks 
  let cursor = 0; //  memoizedState 
  function useEffect(callback, dep) {
    const hasDeps = !dep // dep
    const deps = memoizedState[cursor]
    const hasChangeDeps = deps ? !dep.every((el, i ) => el === deps[i]) : true
    if (hasDeps || hasChangeDeps) {
      callback();
      memoizedState[cursor] = dep
    }
    cursor++;
  }

  let memoizedState = []; // hooks 
  let cursor = 0; //  memoizedState 
  function useEffect(callback, dep) {
    const hasDeps = !dep // dep
    const deps = memoizedState[cursor]
    const hasChangeDeps = deps ? !dep.every((el, i ) => el === deps[i]) : true
    if (hasDeps || hasChangeDeps) {
      callback();
      memoizedState[cursor] = dep
    }
    cursor++;
  }

config.js //

import Home from '../contentais/home/index'
import Login from "../contentais/login/index"
import Business from './../contentais/home/business/index';
import Finance from './../contentais/home/finance/index';
import Tissue from './../contentais/home/tissue/index';
import Statistics from './../contentais/home/statistics/index';
import Order from './../contentais/home/order/index';
import UserHome from './../contentais/home/userHome/index';
import Loans from './../contentais/home/order/loans/index';
import Transfer from './../contentais/home/order/transfer/index';
import Insurance from './../contentais/home/order/insurance/index';

const RouteConfig = [
    {
        //title 
        title: "",
        //
        path: "/Home",
        //
        defaultRedirect: true,
        //
        component: Home,
        //
        children: [
            {
                key: "1",
                defaultRedirect: true,

                title: "",
                path: "/Home/one",
                component: UserHome,
            },
            {
                key: "sub1",
                title: "",
                path: "/Home/order",
                component: Order,
                //
                children: [
                    {
                        defaultRedirect: true,

                        key: "2",
                        title: "",
                        path: "/Home/order/loans",
                        component: Loans,
                    },
                    {
                        key: "3",
                        title: "",
                        path: "/Home/order/transfer",
                        component: Transfer,
                    },
                    {
                        key: "4",
                        title: "",
                        path: "/Home/order/insurance",
                        component: Insurance,
                    },
                    //   
                    {
                        path: "/Home/order",
                        redirect: "/Home/order/loans"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                key: "5",
                title: "",
                path: "/Home/finance",
                component: Finance,
            }
            ,
            {
                key: "6",
                title: "",
                path: "/Home/tissue",
                component: Tissue,
            },
            {
                key: "7",
                title: "",
                path: "/Home/statistics",
                component: Statistics,
            },
            {
                key: "8",
                title: "",
                path: "/Home/business",
                component: Business,
            },
            //   
            {
                path: "/Home",
                redirect: "/Home/one"
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        title: "",
        path: "/Login",
        component: Login,
    }, {
        //
        path: "/",
        redirect: "/Home"
    }
]
export default RouteConfig;

routerView.js // 

import { Route, Switch, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"
import React, { Component } from 'react';
class RouteView extends Component {
    render() {

        // props
        // routers 
        // defaultConfig

        const { routers, defaultConfig } = this.props

        //  ?   

        let routerDate = routers ? routers : defaultConfig;

        //

        //
        let routerDatepath = routerDate.filter((item) => {
            return !item.redirect
        })

        //
        let defualtRouter = routerDate.filter((item) => {
            return item.redirect
        })

        //
        let defualtRedirect = defualtRouter.map((item, i) => {
            return <Redirect key={i} path={item.path} to={item.redirect}></Redirect>
        })

        return (<Switch>
            {
                routerDatepath && routerDatepath.map((item, index) => {
                    const Comp = item.component
                    //  render component
                    return <Route path={item.path} render={
                        //api 
                        (api) => {
                            //title
                            document.title = item.title || ""
                            //props
                            return <Comp routers={item.children} {...api}></Comp>
                        }
                    } key={"key" + item.key}></Route>
                    //
                }).concat(defualtRedirect)
            }
        </Switch>)
    }
}
export default RouteView;

app.js // 

import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router } from "react-router-dom"
import RouteConfig from './config.js'; // 
import RouteView from './routeView,js'; // 
class App extends Component {
    render() {
        return <div className="wrapper">
            <Router>
                //
                <RouteView defaultConfig={RouteConfig}></RouteView>
            </Router>
        </div>
    }
}
export default App;

import { BEGIN_GET_POSTS, GET_POSTS, GET_POSTS_ERROR } from '../reducers';

import { combineReducers } from 'redux'

// actions
export const RECEIVE_USERS = 'RECEIVE_USERS';
export const FETCH_USERS_ERROR = 'FETCH_USERS_ERROR';
export const RECEIVE_POSTS = 'RECEIVE_POPTS';
export const FETCH_POSTS_ERROR = 'FETCH_USERS_ERROR';
export const BEGIN_GET_POSTS = 'BEGIN_GET_POSTS';

// action creators
export function GET_USERS(users) {
    return { type: RECEIVE_USERS, users }
}

export function GET_ERROR(error) {
    return { type: FETCH_USERS_ERROR, error }
}

export function GET_POSTS(posts) {
    return { type: RECEIVE_POSTS, posts }
}

export function Begin_GET_POSTS() {
    return { type: BEGIN_GET_POSTS }
}

export function GET_POSTS_ERROR(error) {
    return { type: FETCH_POSTS_ERROR, error }
}

// reducer
const initialState = { 
    fetched: false, 
    users: [{
        key: '1',
        name: '',
        email: 'zhangsan@126.com'
    }],
    posts: [{
        key: '1',
        id: '1',
        title: 'test'
    }],
    error: null
};

const appReducer = (state = initialState, action) => {
    switch(action.type) {
        case FETCH_USERS_ERROR: {
            return {...state, error: action.error} 
            break;
        }
        case RECEIVE_USERS: {
            return {...state, fetched: true, users: action.users} 
            break;
        }
        case FETCH_POSTS_ERROR: {
            return {...state, error: action.error} 
            break;
        }
        case RECEIVE_POSTS: {
            return {...state, fetched: true, posts: action.posts} 
            break;
        }
    }
    return state;
}

export default appReducer

'use strict';

import '../asset/css/style.scss';
import 'antd/dist/antd.min.css';
import React from 'react';
import { render } from 'react-dom';
import { Provider } from 'react-redux';
import { createStore, applyMiddleware, combineReducers } from 'redux';
import logger from 'redux-logger';
import thunk from 'redux-thunk';
import createSagaMiddleware from 'redux-saga';
import axios from 'axios';

import appReducer from './reducers';
import AppRouter from './router';
import rootSaga from './sagas';

const sagaMiddleware = createSagaMiddleware();
const middlewares = [thunk, sagaMiddleware, logger];

const store = createStore(appReducer, applyMiddleware(...middlewares));
sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);

render(
    <Provider store={store}>
        <AppRouter />
    </Provider>,
    document.getElementById('app')
);

createElement

function createElement(type, props, children) {
    return new Element(type, props, children)
}
class Element{
    constructor(type, props, children){
        this.type = type;
        this.props = props;
        this.children = children
    }
}

DOMrender

//rendervNodeDOM
function render(eleObj){
    //
    let el = document.createElement(eleObj.type);
    //
    for(let key in eleObj.props) {
        setAttr(el, key, eleObj.props[key]);
    }
    //
    eleObj.children.foEach(child => {
        child = child instanceof Element ? render(child) : document.createTextNode(child);
        el.appendChild(child);
    })
}
setAttr(node, key, value) {
    switch(key) {
        case 'value':
            if (node.tagName.toUpperCase() === 'INPUT' || node.tagName.toUpperCase() === 'TEXTAREA') {
                node.value = value;          
            }else {
                node.setAttribute(key, value);
            }
            break;
        case 'style':
            node.style.cssText = value;
            break;
        default:
            node.setAttribute(key, value);
            break;
    }
}

renderDom

//DOM
function renderDom(el, target) {
    target.appendChild(el);
}

DOM DIFF

DOM DIFF DOMDOM

  1. {type:REPLACE,newNode:newNode}
  2. {type:ATTRS,attrs:{class: list-group}
  3. DOM{type:REMOVE,index:XXX}
  4. {type:TEXT, text:1}
//diff 
let Index = 0;
function diff(oldTree, newTree) {
    let patches = {};
    let index = 0;
    //
    walk(oldTree, newTree, index, patches);
    return patches;
}
function walk(oldTree, newTree, index, patches){
    let currentPatch = [];//
    if (!newTree) {
        currentPatch.push({type:'REMOVE', index})
    } 
    if (isString(oldTree) && isString(newTree)) {
        // 
        if (oldTree !== newTree) {
            currentPatch.push({type:'TEXT',text:newTree}); 
        }
    }else if(oldTree.type === newTree.type) {
        //
        let attrs = diffAttr(oldTree.props, newTree.props);
        if(Object.keys(attrs).length) {
            currentPatch.push({type:'ATTRS', attrs});
        }
        // 
          diffChildren(oldTree.children, newTree.children, index, patches);
    } else {
        // 
        currentPatch.push({type:'REPLACE', newTree});
    }
    // 
    if(currentPatch.length) {
        patches[index] = currentPatch; 
    }
}
function diffAttr(oldAttrs, newAttrs) {
    let patch = {};
    for(let key in oldAttrs) {
        if(oldAttrs[key] !== newAttrs[key]) {
            patch[key] = newAttrs[key];//undefined      
        }
    }
    for(let key in newAttrs) {
        //
        if(! oldAttrs.hasOwnProperty(key)) {
            patch[key] = newAttrs[key]
        }
    }
    return patch;
}

function diffChildren(oldChildren, newChildren, index, patches){
    // 
    oldChildren.forEach((child, idx) => {
        // 
        // Index walkindexIndex
        walk(child, newChildren[idx], ++Index, patches);
    }) 
}


function isString(node) {
    return Object.prototype.toString.call(node) === '[object string]';
}


function patch(node, patches) {
